sentences: Brian Todd Collins (born April 1, 1986), known professionally as Kid Ink, is an American rapper, singer, and record producer from Los Angeles.
section: N/A

sentences: He released his debut independent album Up & Away in 2012, following an EP titled Almost Home, and his first major studio album My Own Lane in 2014.
section: N/A

sentences: The latter spawned the singles "Show Me" (featuring Chris Brown), "Iz U Down" (featuring Tyga), and "Main Chick" (featuring Chris Brown).
section: N/A

sentences: On February 3, 2015, he released his third studio album Full Speed, which spawned the singles "Body Language" (featuring Usher and Tinashe), "Hotel" (featuring Chris Brown), and "Be Real" (featuring Dej Loaf).
section: N/A

sentences: In December 2015, Kid Ink released a surprise commercial mixtape Summer in the Winter with the supporting single "Promise" (featuring Fetty Wap).
section: N/A

sentences: In 2016, he released the mixtape RSS2 and the EP 7 Series with the lead single "F with U" (featuring Ty Dolla Sign) in 2017.
section: N/A

sentences: He cites  Pharrell Williams and Swizz Beatz as part of his inspiration for its work ethic with the production and songwriting, when he said: "These were artists and producers who were writing for other people in all types of genres.

sentences: The song would be released for digital download on January 22, 2013.

section: == Career == | === 2013–2014: Signing with RCA, Almost Home and My Own Lane ===

sentences: It has since peaked at number 90 on the Billboard Hot 100 and number 27 on the Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs chart.

sentences: Kid Ink has over 100 tattoos on his face, back, arms, hands, and torso.
section: == Personal life ==

sentences: He got his first tattoo when he was 16 and has been "addicted" to getting tattoos since.
section: == Personal life ==

sentences: His favorites include portraits of his mother and grandfather on his chest and a tiger on the front of his neck, which represents his Chinese birth sign.
section: == Personal life ==

sentences: He showed off his tattoos for one of PETA's "Ink Not Mink" anti-fur ads in 2013.
section: == Personal life ==

sentences: Kid Ink has been in a relationship with model Asiah Azante for over a decade.

sentences: The couple became engaged in June 2015.
